h2: Discover, share, and support ideas made by real people—no AI, just authentic human imagination.
feat_1_p: In a world increasingly dominated by artificial intelligence, thisisnotai.xyz is a celebration of pure human creativity. We believe that authentic, original ideas and works deserve a space where they are valued and recognized—free from the influence of AI-generated content.
footer_p: Made by Rafa Canosa & the open source community
